#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#define gc getchar

using namespace std;
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

int gcd(int m,int n)
{
	return n == 0 ? m : gcd(n,m % n);
}


int main(){
int t;
scanint(t);
while(t--){
    int i,j,n,q,a[100002],gcdl[100002],gcdr[100002],l,r;
    scanint(n);
    scanint(q);
    gcdl[0]=0;
    gcdr[n+1]=0;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
        scanint(a[i]);
        gcdl[i]=gcd(gcdl[i-1],a[i]);
    }
    for(j=n;j>0;j--){
        gcdr[j]=gcd(gcdr[j+1],a[j]);
    }

    while(q--){
            scanint(l);
            scanint(r);
        printf("%d\n",gcd(gcdl[l-1],gcdr[r+1]));
    }

}


return 0;
}
